effects.name: End Effect
effects.effect: At the end of each of his turns, Rhodar can take 20 damage to end one effect on him that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

effects.name: Solo Turns
effects.effect: Rhodar can take two turns each round. He can't take turns consecutively.
Rhodar has damage immunity 5. If he takes holy damage, he loses this immunity until the end of the round.
Each enemy within 10 squares of Rhodar takes a -2 penalty to saving throws.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target restrained this way is impaled by a spear. Rhodar has four spears, each of which can be used to impale a target. At the start of each of his turns, Rhodar can summon any of his spears back to himself, ending the restrained condition on an impaled target.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target makes an Intuition test.
While a target is frightened this way, Rhodar ignores banes and double banes on abilities used against them.

effects.tier1: 17 corruption damage; M<4 bleeding (save ends) and prone
effects.tier2: 24 corruption damage; prone; M<5 bleeding (save ends)
effects.tier3: 30 corruption damage; prone; M<6 the target is bleeding until the end of the encounter

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Rhodar regains Stamina equal to half the damage dealt.

effects.tier1: 6 damage, 2 corruption damage; push 2; M<4 bleeding (save ends)
effects.tier2: 6 damage, 7 corruption damage; push 5; M<5 bleeding (save ends)
effects.tier3: 6 damage, 10 corruption damage; push 7; M<6 bleeding (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Rhodar shifts up to his speed before or after using this ability. He regains Stamina equal to half the total corruption damage dealt.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each area is saturated with vengeful spirits until the end of the round. Any enemy who enters the area for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes 5 corruption damage. At the end of the round, the spirits violently disperse. Each enemy within 2 squares of an area and has P<5 is weakened (save ends).

items.name: Reactive Rebuke
items.trigger: A creature within distance makes a strike against Rhodar.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: A target who has I<5 is frightened. This effect ends if the target is 11 or more squares from Rhodar.
Rhodar has speed 15 and an edge on power rolls while any creature within 20 squares of him is bleeding. Any bleeding creature within 10 squares of Rhodar can't hide.

effects.tier1: 8 corruption damage; A<4 the target is blood soaked (save ends)
effects.tier2: 13 corruption damage; A<5 the target is blood soaked (save ends)
effects.tier3: 16 corruption damage; A<6 the target is blood soaked until the end of the encounter

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While a creature is blood soaked, Rhodar has a double edge on abilities used against them.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target makes a Presence test.
effects.tier1: 16 corruption damage; the target is bleeding until the end of the encounter

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Rhodar teleports to an unoccupied space in the area. If he has lost the damage immunity from his Grave Ward trait, he regains it.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Rhodar teleports to an unoccupied space adjacent to one target after the ability resolve.
